infrastructure.repository package

Submodules

infrastructure.repository.ReportInFile module

class infrastructure.repository.ReportInFile.ReportInFile(file_path: str)[source]

Bases: ReportInterface

Class for saving report metrics to a file.

file_path

The path to the directory where the report file will be saved.

Type:

str

save(metrics: BasicReport, filename: str = 'all_results.csv')[source]

Saves the given metrics to a CSV file.

Parameters:

  • metrics (BasicReport) – The evaluation metrics to be saved.

  • filename (str, optional) – The name of the file to save the metrics, by default “all_results.csv”.

infrastructure.repository.TrainRepositoryInFile module

class infrastructure.repository.TrainRepositoryInFile.TrainRepositoryInFile(file_path: str)[source]

Bases: TrainRepository

Class for saving algorithm training data to a file.

file_path

The path to the directory where the training data file will be saved.

Type:

str

save(algorithmData: AlgorithmConfigurator, filename='all_models.csv')[source]

Saves the given algorithm configuration data to a CSV file.

Parameters:

  • algorithmData (AlgorithmConfigurator) – The algorithm configuration data to be saved.

  • filename (str, optional) – The name of the file to save the data, by default “all_models.csv”.
